data.actual_result: It doesn't get cached. There is only a workaround to get the user instantly cached by removing the space between the search filter and the user input (`from:{user}` instead `from: {user}`)
data.expected_result: The user should get instantly cached when typing the name.
data.short_description: Search doesn't cache users when searching for them
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the search for any server (very big server like Discord Testers is better) - Use the `mentions:` or `from:` filter - Start typing the name of any user that might be uncached (you could find some old user names with bug bot's messages) - Observe the user suggestions to search for
